alert.note: Alert for Central Columbia River Gorge; Greater Vancouver Area; Lower Columbia and I - 5 Corridor in Cowlitz County; Western Columbia River Gorge (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 22 at 2:25PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...POTENTIAL FOR LOW ELEVATION SNOW FRIDAY AND SATURDAY MORNINGS... There is a 20 percent chance for snow accumulations of up to 1 inches. For areas below 1000 ft. This includes the Greater Portland/Vancouver Metro Area, Salem, Eugene, Kelso, Cascade Locks, Albany as well as other locations within the Willamette Valley and along the Columbia River. This will be from 10 PM Thursday to 8 AM PDT Friday and 10 PM Friday to 8 AM PDT Saturday. For additional weather information and to stay up to date on the current forecast visit our web site at www.weather.gov/portland

area.areaDesc: Central Columbia River Gorge; Greater Vancouver Area; Lower Columbia and I - 5 Corridor in Cowlitz County; Western Columbia River Gorge
